en.disableRuleBody: Disabling a recommendation means that this recommendation across all systems will not be shown in reports and dashboards.
en.ruleIsDisabledTooltip: Indicates this recommendation across all systems will not be shown in reports and dashboards.
en.ruleIsDisabledBody: This recommendation has been disabled and has no results.
en.ruleIsDisabledJustification: This recommendation has been disabled for all systems for the following reason:
en.ruleIsDisabledForSystems: Recommendation is disabled for some systems
en.ruleIsDisabledForAllSystems: Recommendation is disabled for all systems

en.enableRuleForSystems: Enable this recommendation for all systems

en.rulestable.norulehits.anyrulesbody: None of your connected systems are affected by any known rules.

en.rulestable.action.hide: Hide recommendations with no impacted systems

en.overview.actioncall.title: Get started with Red Hat Insights
en.overview.connectsystems.title: Connect your first systems
en.overview.connectsystems.body:
Connect at least 10 systems to get a better
        awareness of issues and optimizations
        identified across your infastructure
en.overview.connectsystems.action: Learn how to connect a system to Insights
en.overview.remediate.title: Remediate Insights findings with Ansible
en.overview.remediate.body:
Easily generate an Ansible playbook to 
        quickly and effectively remediate Insights findings
en.overview.remediate.action: Get started with Insights and Ansible Playbooks
en.overview.deploy.title: Deploy Insights at scale
en.overview.deploy.body:
Get more out of Insights with more systems.
        Quickly connect systems with <linkansible> Ansible </linkansible>
        or <linkpuppet> Puppet </linkpuppet>
en.overview.actioncallnosystems.body:
With predictive analytics, avoid problems and unplanned <break> </break>
        downtime in your Red Hat environment. Red Hat Insights is <break> </break>
        included with your Red Hat Enterprise Linux subscription
en.installClient: Install the client on the RHEL system.
en.registerSystem: Register the system to Red Hat Insights.

en.systemtable.fetch.error: There was an error fetching systems.
en.riskOfChangeTextOne: The change takes very little time to implement and there is minimal impact to system operations.
en.riskOfChangeTextTwo: Typically, these changes do not require that a system be taken offline.
en.riskOfChangeTextThree: These will likely require an outage window.
en.riskOfChangeTextFour: The change takes a significant amount of time and planning to execute, and will impact the system and business operations of the host due to downtime.
en.viewAffectedSystems: View {systems, plural, one {the affected system.} other {# affected systems.}}
en.incidentTooltip: Indicates configurations that are currently affecting your systems.
